response.overview: The tender, heartbreaking story of a young man’s struggle to find himself, told across three defining chapters in his life as he experiences the ecstasy, pain, and beauty of falling in love, while grappling with his own sexuality.
response.tagline: This is the story of a lifetime
response.title: Moonlight

release_dates.note: New York City, NY & Los Angeles, CA
